title: Homeopathy, Health, Healing | Sujata Owens, RSHom(NA), CCH, HMC -Vital Force Consulting - Vaccine Free: Homeopathic Approach
description: Homeopathy, Health, Healing | Sujata Owens, RSHom(NA), CCH, HMC -Vital Force Consulting
cleaned_text: Aside from diet and discipline, no other issue concerns parents more today about their childrens' health then safe use of vaccines. Homeopathic Master Clinician Sujata Owens will review homeopathic alternatives to vaccination. Various controversies in the field of vaccinations stem from reports indicating effect on the brain and behavior. Come hear what homeopathy can offer you and your family. To register
